{{ardayearheader|2977|2978|2979|2980|2981|2982|2983}}

==April==
* '''6''' - Birth of [[Samwise Gamgee]], fifth child and third son of [[Hamfast Gamgee]] and [[Bell Goodchild]].<ref name="Gamgee">{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>

==During 2980==
* [[Thorongil]] ([[Aragorn]]) with the leave of [[Ecthelion II]], [[Surprise Attack on Umbar|attacks Umbar]], destroys the fleet and kills the [[Captain of the Haven]].<ref name="TA"/><ref name=stew/>
*Thorongil leaves his companions at [[Pelargir]] and goes on alone for other tasks. His adventures end.<ref name="TA">{{App|TA}}</ref><ref name=stew>{{App|Stewards}}</ref>
* Aragorn enters [[Lothlórien]] and there meets again [[Arwen|Arwen Undómiel]]. Aragorn gives her the [[ring of Barahir]], and they plight their troth upon the hill of [[Cerin Amroth]].<ref name="TA"/>
* About this time [[Gollum]] reaches the confines of [[Mordor]] and becomes acquainted with [[Shelob]].<ref name="TA"/>
* Birth of [[Everard Took]], fourth child and second son of [[Adelard Took]].<ref name="Took">{{App|Took}}</ref>
* Birth of [[Berilac Brandybuck]], son of [[Merimac Brandybuck]].<ref name="Brandybuck">{{App|Brandybuck}}</ref>
* Birth of [[Fredegar Bolger]], first child and son of [[Odovacar Bolger]] and [[Rosamunda Took]].<ref name="Took"/>
* Birth of [[Tolman Cotton Junior]], first child and son of [[Tolman Cotton Senior]] and [[Lily Brown]].<ref name="Gamgee"/>
* Death of [[Kings of Rohan|King]] [[Thengel]].<ref name="Mark">{{App|Mark}}</ref>
* [[Théoden]], son of Thengel, becomes the seventeenth King of [[Rohan]].<ref name="Mark"/>
* Death of [[Thain]] [[Fortinbras Took II]].<ref name="Took"/>
* [[Ferumbras Took III]], son of Fortinbras, becomes the thirtieth Thain of [[the Shire]].<ref name="Took"/>
* Death of [[Drogo Baggins]] and [[Primula Brandybuck]]; they are drowned in the [[Brandywine]]. Their son, young [[Frodo Baggins]], is adopted by his uncle [[Rorimac Brandybuck]].<ref name="Brandybuck"/><ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref><ref>{{FR|Party}}</ref>
{{references}}
[[Category:Third Age years|2, Third Age 2980]]
